#### 1. Stores & Places Vocabulary: Masculine, Feminine, or Plural?

Write "le", "la", "l'", or "les" plus the French noun for each place (type the correct article and noun in French):

1. "airport" ✈️ → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'l\'aéroport')"><span></span>
2. "library" 📚 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la bibliothèque')"><span></span>
3. "hospital" 🏥 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'l\'hôpital')"><span></span>
4. "park" 🌳 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le parc')"><span></span>
5. "beach" 🏖️ → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la plage')"><span></span>
6. "university" 🎓 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'l\'université')"><span></span>
7. "mall/shopping center" 🛍️ → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le centre commercial')"><span></span>
8. "post office" 📮 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la poste')"><span></span>
9. "museum" 🖼️ → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le musée')"><span></span>
10. "swimming pool" 🏊 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la piscine')"><span></span>
11. "stores/shops" 🏬 → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'les magasins')"><span></span>
12. "church" ⛪ → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'l\'église')"><span></span>

#### 4. Writing Challenge

List 5 masculine and 5 feminine places or stores (in French, with articles).

<textarea placeholder="Write your answers here..." rows="5" cols="120"></textarea>

#### Notes:

Gender hints: Many places are masculine (le parc, le musée, le centre commercial), but some are feminine (la bibliothèque, la plage, la piscine). Plurals use "les".

Partitives: Use "au/à la/aux" for "to the" (au parc, à la plage, aux magasins).

Plural alert: Les magasins (shops), les musées (museums), les parcs (parks) are plural.

#### 4. Défi d'écriture

Listez 5 lieux ou magasins masculins et 5 féminins (en français, avec les articles).

<textarea placeholder="Écrivez vos réponses ici..." rows="5" cols="120"></textarea>

#### Notes :

Astuces sur le genre : Beaucoup de lieux sont masculins (le parc, le musée, le centre commercial), mais certains sont féminins (la bibliothèque, la plage, la piscine). Le pluriel utilise "les".

Partitifs : Utilisez "au/à la/aux" pour "à la/le/aux" (au parc, à la plage, aux magasins).

Attention au pluriel : Les magasins (shops), les musées (museums), les parcs (parks) sont au pluriel.

:::


<script>
function checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer) {
  const span = input.nextElementSibling;
  if (input.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correctAnswer.toLowerCase()) {
    span.textContent = "✓ Correct";
    span.style.color = "green";
  } else {
    span.textContent = "";
  }
}

function showAnswers() {
  document.querySelectorAll('input[type="text"]').forEach(el => {
    const correct = el.getAttribute('oninput')?.match(/'([^']+)'/)?.[1];
    if (correct) {
      const span = el.nextElementSibling;
      span.textContent = `Réponse : ${correct}`;
      span.style.color = "blue";
    }
  });
}

function refreshPage() {
  location.reload();
}
</script>
